channel.title: VPS hosting
channel.description:
When i put server onto my linux operating system
CPU W3520 @ 2.67GHz 20GB 256MB 512MB 200GB 10 Mbps Starters 1
thats my package it gives me this error a little after i start up the the server i may have deleted a file on the host or something but the server seems fine i run it on local host and everything works perfect
This is my error that shuts down my server i don't see how it can be because i dont have enough ram when im using a 317 non pi and only 1 char on...???
[root@pvpwar Server]# PVPWARS is now online! Connection from50291 There are currently 1 players online! kyle UID = 4694930 [client-1-Kyle]: Loading Process Completed [Regular player, lag: 1 ms] [client-1-Kyle]: command: master [client-1-Kyle]: command: cash There are currently 1 players online! Auto Saved For: [1] [Kyle]. # # A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment: # # SIGSEGV (0xb) at pc=0x012b6d14, pid=930, tid=3036674928 # # JRE version: 7.0_09-b05 # Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (23.5-b02 mixed mode, sharing linux-x86 ) # Problematic frame: # V [libjvm.so+0x396d14][thread -1264276624 also had an error] ObjectMonitor::UnlinkAfterAcquire(Thread*, ObjectWaiter*)+0x54 # # Failed to write core dump. Core dumps have been disabled. To enable core dumping, try "ulimit -c unlimited" before starting Java again # # An error report file with more information is saved as: # /root/Server/hs_err_pid930.log # # If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit: # http://bugreport.sun.com/bugreport/crash.jsp #
